attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: If I was able to give it no stars, I would. This app screams false advertising. I thought this was for trumpets, but no all I saw was a large man. I’m very disappointed

attributes.title: 1 Star is a star too many
attributes.review: App is horrible, doesn’t work, the content is racist, sexist, and homophobic, and all in all this should be removed from the App Store. Horrifying and disgusting.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: My dog was stolen after getting this app. I got the app and my phone grew legs so I spoke to it it said it was going to shut down til tok so I tried to brake it but it still Stole my dog and robbed me then road away on Trump's wig.

attributes.title: oops
attributes.review: apple you dropped your crown when you let this app be added to the store. It’s okay you can pick it up once you’ve taken out the garbage💕💞🌟😚👑💞💛

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: The app smell bad and called me ugly also stole my kids after finding my location and they’re currently working in ice camps as guards. Someone please save them also abolish ice 🥰🥰🥰🥰 also acab 😻😻😻

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: I really want trump to see this we are not going down with out a fight try us ok we have the webs the lgbtq+ the witch’s ect I hate u so much and I you can’t win this sorry o what I’m not 😝✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: Worst app ever.
attributes.review: I opened the app and the first thing i see is some big fat orange pig.🤢Then next thing ik he comes out of the screen and stomps on my grandmas face...definitely would not recommend 🥺R.I.P. grams😩❤️

attributes.title: Cheeto dust
attributes.review: This app was very inefficient. It asked me to stand on a bridge and spill cotton candy while eating jalapeños. It also crashed my car which made me loose a million dollars worth of stuff. Highly do not recomend 😔

attributes.title: I can not believe this
attributes.review: This app is so inappropriate my child took my phone an saw a crazy Cheeto and when I saw it scared me so bad that had to be so traumatizing for my child

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: My Cheetos are missing!!!!!!!!!! I don’t know what happened to Barney the dinosaur. My pet cat Griselda fell of my lawnmower and drowned in my sandbox.<€ ¡I found a big wall next to Mexico somebody better check that out!>€
